description.ko: 층층이 쌓인 미네랄의 복잡성을 통해 지구의 역사를 드러내는 지표면 질감에 대한 세밀한 연구입니다.
description.en: A detailed study of Earth's textures, revealing the history of the planet through its layered mineral complexity.

prompt: A macro-topographic cross-section of an ancient fault line. Jagged layers of #8B4513 obsidian and #D2691E red clay intersect with #F4A460 crystalline quartz veins glowing with internal heat. Side lighting from the golden hour highlights the rough #2F4F4F bedrock textures. Hyper-realistic geological sediment, 8k, the narrative of land carved by eons of time.
